John Negroponte , in his meetings with external affairs minister Pranab Mukherjee , foreign secretary shivshanker menon and mr. narayanan, agreed the attacks should be thoroughly investigated and those responsible for perpetrating these attacks must be brought to account. so the effort at the moment is concentrated on investigating these attacks and bringing those responsible to account.
